structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Correspondence by patients with secretary or attorneys.
law.text: No patient of any of the institutions operated by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall be denied the right to correspond with an attorney or with the secretary.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 315, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 260, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1), (9) and (21). -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 21, effective July 1, 1952.
